export const Rates = () => { return (

Rates and Policies

General Lesson Info

I offer 30 minute, 45 minute and 1 hour long lessons. Lesson rates are commensurate with my experience and ability, and quite reasonable for the expertise that I can provide. You may contact me with specific pricing inquiries regarding lesson rates or for anything not listed, including gift certificates or customized Master Classes.

I offer an introductory lesson at a discount rate, as well as monthly discounts for those students paying for monthly blocks of lessons up-front following the introductory lesson. Prices listed below include the monthly discount. All lessons are billed by the month, but if you would like to set up a single lesson, please contact me for rates.{" "}

I also offer FLEX lessons for those who can't make a weekly appointment. With FLEX you pay for 4 lesson credits and you have 8 weeks to use them at your convenience.

I accept cash or check, Venmo, Zelle or you can use a credit card via PayPal to prepay for your lessons.

RATES

INTRO LESSON (30 min): $20 WEEKLY IN-PERSON LESSONS (Billed by month): $35/30 min; $47.5/45 min; $60/1 hr FLEX IN-PERSON LESSONS (Billed 4 at a time): $40/30 min; $55/45 min; $70/1 hr ONLINE LESSONS: (Billed by month): $30/30min; $40/45min; $50/1hr FLEX ONLINE LESSONS (Billed 4 at a time): $35/30 min; $47.5/45 min; $60/1 hr

LESSON POLICIES

TUITION:

Tuition includes the time spent with your instructor, as well as time slot reservation, advice/answered questions/etc. outside the lesson via phone/email, lesson materials, and your instructorâ€™s pre-lesson preparation.

); };
